title: Extent that 1834-48 was an era of the common man

content.question:
The Jacksonian Period (1834-1848) has been celebrated as the era of the “common man.” To what extend did the period live up to its characterization? Consider TWO of the following in your response.

Economic development
Politics
Reform movements

frqParts.text:
The Jacksonian Period (1834-1848) has been celebrated as the era of the “common man.” To what extend did the period live up to its characterization? Consider TWO of the following in your response.

Economic development
Politics
Reform movements

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
